string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: He is one of the founding members of the X-Men.
He is a member of the X-Men. He has a mysterious and confused past
He is a powerful telepathic mutant and leader of the X-Men
She is a mutant and member of the X-Men. She comes from Africa. She would also be leader of the Morlocks for a long time

He is one of the original members of the X-Men. While working as a member of the group, Jean developed romantic feelings for Scott Summers and found herself the center of attention to Wolverine as well.

He is one of the original members of the X-Men. He has been with the team throughout its history. He has extensive knowledge in chemistry and biology, whose own research was used to nearly destroy mutantkind. He has also been a member of the Avengers
She is a mutant and a member of the X-Men
He is a mutant and a member of the X-Men and formerly a member of the Thieves\' Guild
She is a mutant and a member of the X-Men.
He is a mutant and member of the X-Men

He is a revolutionary leader who believes mutants are the next stage of evolution for humanity and are destined to take over the world. He is a friend and enemy to Professor Charles Xavier. He is often an adversary of, though sometimes an ally to, the X-Men.
He is a mutant supervillain. He is a former member of Team X and is the archenemy to Wolverine
He is the step-brother to Charles Xavier. He used a mystical gem to become the unstoppable Juggernaut
He is the man who designed the Sentinels
He is a time traveling mutant, mercenary, and leader of X-Force. He spends much of his time trying to take down the evil mutant Apocalypse in the year 3999 AD
Kelly served as a Senator and later as President
She is a shapeshifting mutant. She is the leader of the Brotherhood of Mutants.
He is the son of Sabretooth and Mystique. He was the leader of the anti-mutant hate group Friends of Humanity.
He is an extremely powerful and ancient mutant. His ultimate goal is to rule the entire planet.
He is a mutant from the future of New York in 2055 AD. He became a time traveller in order to make his present a better place

string-array.name: pouvoirs
string-array.item: Healing Factor; Animal-Like Senses; Adamantium Claws and Skeleton
Extraordinary Agility; Superhuman Strength; Blue Beast-like Appearance
Power Absorption; Memory Absorption; Flight; Super Strength and Durability
Generate and Manipulate Magnetic Fields; Control of Magnetism
Healing Factor; Superhuman Senses; Enhanced Strength; Claws; Animal-Like Appearance
Crimson Gem of Cyttorak; Enormous Strength and Durability; Near Invincibility
Extreme Strength; Extreme Durability; Shapeshifting; Energy Projection; Size Alteration; Apparent Immortality
